author: kwright
msg: Fix for CONNECTORS-28.  Catch the specific situation that was being treated incorrectly.  This is a narrow fix, so there may be other cases where a similar trap is called for.

msg: [sshd] include tomcat-apr in the distribution and avoid logging exceptions when closing the auth forward support
